entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -23.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -23.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -27.3°C
Wind: SSW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:50 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
